languages.text: {n}Знак на нашивке кителя вам знаком — это метка одной из средних палуб, не имеющих ничего общего с отсеком, где вы находитесь. Само присутствие этого офицера здесь — преступление против законов корабля.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Знак на нашивке кителя вам знаком — это метка одной из средних палуб, не имеющих ничего общего с отсеком, где вы находитесь. Само присутствие этого офицера здесь — преступление против законов корабля.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The patch on his jacket bears a familiar crest — it is the symbol of one of the middle decks, one that has no connection to this compartment. The officer's presence here on its own is a violation of the ship's regulations.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Знак на нашивке кителя вам знаком — это метка одной из средних палуб, не имеющих ничего общего с отсеком, где вы находитесь. Само присутствие этого офицера здесь — преступление против законов корабля.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The patch on his jacket bears a familiar crest — it is the symbol of one of the middle decks, one that has no connection to this compartment. The officer's presence here on its own is a violation of the ship's regulations.{/n}

{n}The patch on his jacket bears a familiar crest — it is the symbol of one of the middle decks, one that has no connection to this compartment. The officer's presence here on its own is a violation of the ship's regulations.{/n}

{n}The patch on his jacket bears a familiar crest — it is the symbol of one of the middle decks, one that has no connection to this compartment. The officer's presence here on its own is a violation of the ship's regulations.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼のジャケットのパッチにはなじみ深い紋章が縫いつけられている。この区画とは関係のない中央甲板の印だ。彼がここにいること自体、船の規則に違反している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The patch on his jacket bears a familiar crest — it is the symbol of one of the middle decks, one that has no connection to this compartment. The officer's presence here on its own is a violation of the ship's regulations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼のジャケットのパッチにはなじみ深い紋章が縫いつけられている――この区画とは関係のない中央甲板の印だ。彼がここにいること自体、船の規則に違反している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他夹克上的标识在你看来非常熟悉，那是中层甲板的标识，与他目前所在的船舱没有任何关系。这名军官独自出现在这里，显然违反了船上的规定。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The patch on his jacket bears a familiar crest — it is the symbol of one of the middle decks, one that has no connection to this compartment. The officer's presence here on its own is a violation of the ship's regulations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他夹克上的标识在你看来非常熟悉，那是中层甲板的标识，与他目前所在的船舱没有任何关系。这名军官独自出现在这里，显然违反了船上的规定。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El parche de su chaqueta lleva un emblema que reconoces: es el símbolo de una de las cubiertas centrales, que no guarda relación alguna con este compartimento. La mera presencia de este oficial aquí ya constituiría una infracción de las normas de la nave.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The patch on his jacket bears a familiar crest — it is the symbol of one of the middle decks, one that has no connection to this compartment. The officer's presence here on its own is a violation of the ship's regulations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El parche de su chaqueta lleva un emblema que reconoces: es el símbolo de una de las cubiertas centrales, que no guarda relación alguna con este compartimento. La mera presencia de este oficial aquí ya constituiría una infracción de las normas de la nave.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'insigne sur sa veste porte un blason que vous reconnaissez : celui de l'un des ponts intermédiaires, sans aucun lien avec ce compartiment. La présence de l'officier enfreint donc le règlement du vaisseau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The patch on his jacket bears a familiar crest — it is the symbol of one of the middle decks, one that has no connection to this compartment. The officer's presence here on its own is a violation of the ship's regulations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'insigne sur sa veste porte un blason que vous reconnaissez : celui de l'un des ponts intermédiaires, sans aucun lien avec ce compartiment. La présence de l'officier enfreint donc le règlement du vaisseau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Aufnäher auf seiner Jacke zeigt ein vertrautes Wappen – es gehört zu einem der mittleren Decks und hat keine Verbindung zu dieser Abteilung. Schon die Anwesenheit des Offiziers hier ist ein Verstoß gegen die Schiffsvorschriften.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The patch on his jacket bears a familiar crest — it is the symbol of one of the middle decks, one that has no connection to this compartment. The officer's presence here on its own is a violation of the ship's regulations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aufnäher auf seiner Jacke zeigt ein vertrautes Wappen – es gehört zu einem der mittleren Decks und hat keine Verbindung zu dieser Abteilung. Schon die Anwesenheit des Offiziers hier ist ein Verstoß gegen die Schiffsvorschriften.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ceketindeki yamada tanıdık bir arma var: Bu sembol, orta güvertelerden birine ait ve bu kompartımanla bağlantısı yok. Subayın burada bulunuşu bile başlı başına gemideki yönetmeliklerin ihlal edildiğini gösteriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The patch on his jacket bears a familiar crest — it is the symbol of one of the middle decks, one that has no connection to this compartment. The officer's presence here on its own is a violation of the ship's regulations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ceketindeki yamada tanıdık bir arma var: Bu sembol, orta güvertelerden birine ait ve bu kompartımanla bağlantısı yok. Subayın burada bulunuşu bile başlı başına gemideki yönetmeliklerin ihlal edildiğini gösteriyor.{/n}
